forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 48F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 55F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 53F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
